root.Summary: 1: Gu Y, Zhang X, Yang Q, Wang JM, He YP, Sun ZG, Zhang HQ, Wang J. Erratum:Uterine NDRG2 expression is increased at implantation sites during earlypregnancy in mice, and its down-regulation inhibits decidualization of mouseendometrial stromal cells. Reprod Biol Endocrinol. 2015 Aug 29;13:98. doi:10.1186/s12958-015-0089-x. PubMed PMID: 26319599; PubMed Central PMCID:PMC4552999.
